about_the_game:
The Replacables is an action RPG with rogue-like elements that has large-scale battles and unique and diverse battle encounters. The Replacables will grow era by era, starting with the launch of a free to play demo.

Face fractured timelines where eras collide, leading to thrilling scenarios like knights facing dinosaurs or Romans battling space marines. This unique mix keeps each battle unpredictable and exciting.

Engage in massive battles where you're just one part of an epic warfront. Using strategic commands, you can direct your own company of troops, coordinating movements and tactics to turn the tide in these grand-scale conflicts.

Take on diverse characters across different eras and armies, each with unique paths of growth. Every character contributes to strengthening the “Void of Time,” as closing each time fracture grants elemental artifacts that boost power. These artifacts carry forward across all eras, enhancing the player’s abilities no matter when or where they fight.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains fantasy battles and fantasy violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+

short_description: In this epic time-travel adventure, you play as a replaceable. Join massive battles and rewrite fractured events to alter the course of history. Find yourself facing knights, samurai, modern soldiers and even dinosaurs.
